Room.Name: Lord Aaileman's Personal Chambers
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Lord Aaileman's personal chambers. Aaileman is the head of the Kista Council of Law and Order, dedicated to peace among the races.
Room.LongDescription: The chambers are about ten meters wide and long, covered with ornate golden trinkets and other items that appear to have no real bearing on anything. There are a couple of small statues and models of new cities being planned. There's also a large map of the region of Kista. Aaileman is usually in his chambers, here, but sometimes he's in the throne room or talking in the council chambers.
